actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to exclude any prohibitions relating to the provisions of abortions.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct that, except as provided in Title X of such Act (Population Research and Voluntary Family Planning Programs), no program for which funds are authorized by such Act which directly or indirectly provide health services shall exclude from such programs or services the provision of abortions as a health service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to exclude any prohibitions relating to the provisions of abortions.
